meanings.definition: Any one out of all possible options
meanings.sent1: You can choose whichever you like from the menu.
meanings.sent2: I will take whichever book you recommend.
meanings.sent3: The cat can sleep in whichever box it pleases.
meanings.sent4: The treasure could be hidden in whichever corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: Whichever path you take, make sure it leads you to happiness.

meanings.definition: Used to introduce a choice between two or more alternatives
meanings.sent1: You can have tea or coffee, whichever you prefer.
meanings.sent2: She can go to the park or stay home, whichever she decides.
meanings.sent3: I will dance at the party, whichever song plays.
meanings.sent4: He will be happy, whichever team wins the game.
meanings.sent5: Whichever way the wind blows, we will face it together.
